description: Doesn't even detect that Jack is running. Guitarix does.
Chrases and when it opens it makes the loudest high pitched noise ever that you cant lower except by closing app. Worthless
Most of what the other review says is basically the sound card / driver he is using. Give it a shot, its free!
I wanted to believe the 3 star reviewer, but Rakarrack wouldn't even open.
summary: couldn't get it to even open

description: Once the sound card issue was solved... It works like a charm. I'm going to get some better speakers (and louder) and see how it works. Wait... I wonder... What if I plug it into my amp? Naw... I bet not try that. If any of you do, let me know how that works out.
It looks so ugly and just bunch of chaos!
I always install this amp whenever I switch operating system. Easy to use and great sound out of a pc with lots of effects. I use it as an an amp for playing harmonica
summary: My favorite amp - simple to use great sound out of the pc

description: I'm using Focusrite Scarlett as the external sound card USB connection to the PC, configured via Jack (QJackCTL). This plugs into my AMP and I get to play the guitar with all this wonderful sound effects. You do need the correct equipment and a little bit of YouTube to get familiar with it. But worth the effort.

Grenzen setzten hier nur die Rechner-Power und das eigene Denkvermögen. Doch allein mit den Presets hat man bereits genügend Auswahl um mindestens 1000 Songs zu gestalten. Dazu noch die vielfältigen Einstellungsmöglichkeiten, die dank Speicher jederzeit reproduzierbar sind.

Con Qjackctl y Rakarrack usa la guitarra en el PC con una interfaz USB sin amplificador y con múltiples efectos de guitarra. Permite grabar con JACK en Audacity. Samples limpios decentes y multiples controles para personalizar. No es tan bueno como Guitar Rig o Amplitube pero sirve para uso casero.
summary: Funcional con interfaz de audio USB

description: con rakarrak  podras hacer de todas las musicas faciles rakarrak es lo mejor del mundo me enamore de rakarrak.
summary: desde la paloma durazno soy geena

agh que rabia, mas lo que leceé con guitarix y ahora no sirve ni rakarrak.

AYUDENME NO SE QUE HACER PARA SOLUCIONARLO!

Rakarrack один может заменить огромный набор аппаратных эффектов. Все эффекты настраиваются. При запуске нескольких программ можно одновременно обрабатывать эффекты и сводить звук от нескольких гитар на одном компьютере. Для быстрого переключения эффектов желательно иметь клавиатуру в форме педалей с цифрами 0 ... 9 и буквой R.
